entry.title: Dr Gao's report
entry.content:
On one Sunday, I was at KFC in Wanda to learn some English lecture about words. Bo called me, told me go back to the company to have a meeting.

When I knew the message, it is after 3 pm, and the meeting have already started. So I run my bicycle fast to come back.

Luckily, when I reached, the meeting had not started.

The reporter is Gao. who graduated from NEU and lived in AUS now. He report some new information and technology about the Australian Mineral Processing. Some bigger and newer machines.

And some new theories in foreign.

Like, SAG flowsheet, SAB, SABC flowsheet. And in froth flotation, how to control the separation and measure what.

Which is the best bubble’s diameter in flotation? And you know the company is building the Mineral Processing Expert System. So Gao said some about expert system and JKmetsim that I knew but never used and touched software.

This is a good experiment.

entry.title: I built a Flotation Separator with blender
entry.content:
Boss Xie had talked with us fresh men about the 3D moduling, he thought the studio need men to build 3D module. And I can kind of use Blender, I told him this.

After this talk, I started learning and using blender again. Though I had no books to watch. But there are many tutorials in my disk, after all, blender is an open software. A few days ago, I finished this flotation separator.

It is not very cool, or verisimilitude. But at least, when I show this to Biao, he can recognize it.

entry.title: The difference between Coal Preparation and the Metal Preparation
entry.content:
Most of what I learned in university is coal processing, though my major is called mineral processing. And trully, I just learned fewer knowledge about other mineral’s processing than coal. But the company’s business is more relative about metal. And there was mineral processing training these days. It is about mineral, especially metal. After the company’s train and learning in school, I want to talk about the things about the difference between coal and metal. And I want to tell you directly, There is no difference originally.

Some teachers' mislead

Neally all teachers in CUMT tell us most of the CUMT’s courses are about coal. Though there are courses about non-metal minerals, iron and smelting, though some teachers disagree.

But they ignore one thing, the methods to prepare minerals is the same.

There is only one teaching material about Mineral Processing in China

Not only the method is the same, but the teaching material. I found the students from NEU, CUMTB, HPU who learn Mineral Processing were all using the same book Mineral Processing edited in chage by Xie Guangyuan. Who is the dean of my college.

The same mechines are used in metal and coal

Jinjing, Haiwang, Derick the same companies are chosen to choose the mechines during directing plant. In old time, I think there is a lot of difference between designing a mineral praparation plant and a coal preparation plant. After the train, I found it is not, most of the companies' mechines are for coal or metal or other minerals.

In other words, I hope the graduate from CUMT remember our school’s name is CUMT not China’s University of Coal and Technology. And I hope the social, the non-coal preparation plant trust graduate from CUMT. We can not only prepare coal but also metal, non-coal.

entry.title: 最近几天面试得到的经验
entry.content:
最近，几天投了不少简历，也参加了几次面试。在此写个总结，纯粹为经验之谈。

简历投递之后，很多在简历筛选环节就被筛掉了。

对此，我一直很郁闷，为什么会这样，在矿大这个以煤炭为主的学校，矿物加工这样专业的竟然简历直接被筛掉。在云峰被筛，我认可，在卡特被筛，也没有怨言，但是很多在线投递的，也是夭无音讯，就让我很困惑了。专业对口，学校的优势专业，竟然连回复都没有。甚至有一家，找矿加背景的网站编辑，也对我的简历无动于衷，我至少也是网站站长还做过学校兼职记者的人呢？至少，在本校本专业，我还不知道有人像我一样，买个域名建个网站玩的呢。 直到今天，康利的面试我明白了，但凡存在筛选简历的企业，会关注你一下几点： 1. 双学位/辅修 2. 奖学金

好吧，我没有辅修，因为矿大只有辅修没有双学位，所以我当时没有去辅修其他专业。而奖学金，我从来没有去想过，不是我傻到，连钱都不想要，只是我觉着为了拿奖学金付出的比你得到的要少，当然，这份帐每个人有每个人的算法。

直接面试的企业

很多企业，或者说更Modern的企业，一般会选择这种方式，初试即面试或笔试，毕竟这些企业希望能够尽量网罗人才而不错过一个。比如JD 比如KTC。

新加坡KTC在招采矿专业的，预计招两个，蔡董事长亲自参与面试、选拔、宣讲。薪水很高、待遇不错，但是真正吸引我的真的不是待遇、薪水，而是印尼的工作机会，我曾进说过，但凡出国工作机会，无论是非洲、蒙古、还是东南亚只要要人，我就去。具体原因，此处不赘述。当然，我是学矿加的，一点底气都没有。不过，上午宣讲结束时，我还是问了一下，师兄说，“你可以投递简历，公司看重的是能力”。然后，我就投了，你懂的，我的简历别无所长，于是我把我在听的MOOC写在上边了，现在，我在同时学四门，这还不能表达我对知识的热爱和我的学习能力吗？ 看来，很多面试官确是认为不。当然，下午，重新接着上午面试，很失败，我说话快了，模糊了，而且语言整理不是很好，语气把握、言语底气都不当，相信蔡董应当没有听懂我说的内容，而另一位师兄，应当也听的不多，于是，我介绍完了之后，看见蔡董在我的简历上写了6.0。

怎么说呢，KTC是直接面试，直接可以拿Offer，坐我后边的采矿兄弟，就因为问了蔡董一句–“既然ＫＴＣ要管理人才，为什么不去管理学院。”，然后，私底下嘟囔了一句“我技术行，管理……”，然后，就拿Offer了。这个人不是我，我并不遗憾，我虽然十分希望能够获得去印尼的工作机会，但既然神让我面试失败，自有其道理，我十分希望得到这次机会，但是一切凭着神，我的意愿永远只是第二位的

我真心希望能有哪个企业需要我这种能在很多条件下，高语速表达的人，因为，我认为高语速，显示了，高反映速度和高思维敏捷程度。不过，现在还没有碰到这样的企业。

Tips

  1. 准备一份面试发言内容，不要每次去再思考
  2. 语速适当降低，说话要清楚
  3. 修改一下简历，突出特长

当然，这只是对我而言。

希望在双选会，能够得到去东南亚工作的机会。Amen

有的，还要给他。没有的，连他已有的也要夺取。



 May God be with you,my visitor.
